title: Neon Night
text: The shimmer of neon lights strikes puddles of rainwater. I keep my head down on busy streets. Tonight is game night for the city… but for me, it’s the moment my art comes alive.

speaker: Belander
text: I heard you’re heading with the Super Naturals tomorrow. Giantik Mountains with that horrible excuse for a minor league team? You’d be better off at the forge with family.

prompt: You give Belander a parting gift…

choices.label: (Mace) Signed by a legendary league member
(Tower Shield) Used in the infamous 3-dragon-breath barrage meme

title: Night Before Departure
text: I tinker away. It’s unfortunate I haven’t told them I might not return with the party. Not gone forever… but if Giantland offers a life worth taking, I’ll take it.

speaker: Mother
text: Dear son, you should get some rest. Everyone sends their concern. Be safe— and don’t forget the provisions I prepared for you.

title: Caravan Sets Out
text: Besides the Super Naturals, there are five of us on this pilgrimage. Relatively safe… if you ignore the harpies, the hypogriffs, and the time Apex rode a wyvern like it owed him money.

title: Harpies in the Wind
text: Wings. Screams. Claws. The sky turns into a problem with too many sharp edges.

prompt: Camp scene: pick one person to talk to tonight (limited actions).

title: Giantik Mountains
text: The mountains don’t rise. They loom— like someone paused a god mid-sentence.

title: Blessing
text: The shaman’s words are older than the league and heavier than stone. Something in me shifts— not louder… lighter.

title: Not Enough Space
text: They teleport out. There isn’t space for all of us. The air snaps closed, and suddenly… I’m not ‘with the party’ anymore.

title: Cloud Forge
text: I find a forge that sings with sky-metal. Everything can be made lighter here— if your hands can learn the language.

title: Homecoming
text: The forge is home. But I’m not the same metal I was when I left.
